title: There's no interactions between Vel'Koz and Illaoi?
body:
No interactions?

At all?

Not even a small quip about tentacles?

That's a shame.

replies.body: They have no interactions because they already have enough tentacles to know where things are going,

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Emma,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-15T13:30:47.857+0000)
>
> They have no interactions because they already have enough tentacles to know where things are going,

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Emma,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-15T13:30:47.857+0000)
>
> They have no interactions because they already have enough tentacles to know where things are going,

{{champion:119}} <--The face I made when seeing that
{{champion:81}} <-- My friend

{{champion:16}} <-- the face of that one offended person
{{champion:29}} <-- my face reacting to the offended person :p
Me in general {{champion:83}}
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

As a "bug" question 

Have you tried taunting it several times?

Illaoi has pushed forward the tech work we started on Dunk master Darius, sion, rek'sai, Tahm  kench and kindred

She has a banks of general taunts, faction taunts, and specific taunts.  

So, when you taunt with her you should keep getting new various taunts -depending on a couple variables.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-15T20:59:33.506+0000)
>
> As a "bug" question 
> 
> Have you tried taunting it several times?
> 
> Illaoi has pushed forward the tech work we started on Dunk master Darius, sion, rek'sai, Tahm  kench and kindred
> 
> She has a banks of general taunts, faction taunts, and specific taunts.  
> 
> So, when you taunt with her you should keep getting new various taunts -depending on a couple variables.

I don't have access to the PBE to try her out (because you don't want a dumb coop vs ai player like me on the PBE) but I haven't seen or heard any lines that seem to specifically relate to Vel'Koz.
most people end up doing customs anyway
Well yeah...Queue time is like 10 minutes a game, and I can test quite a bit using just bots (general bugs, maybe jungle clearing).

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-15T20:59:33.506+0000)
>
> As a "bug" question 
> 
> Have you tried taunting it several times?
> 
> Illaoi has pushed forward the tech work we started on Dunk master Darius, sion, rek'sai, Tahm  kench and kindred
> 
> She has a banks of general taunts, faction taunts, and specific taunts.  
> 
> So, when you taunt with her you should keep getting new various taunts -depending on a couple variables.

I love it when you guys reply only about Champion releases, skin releases , and "Riot <3 " threads.
There's a huge outcry btw, on the boards right here. People are screaming because you ruined the game. Or shall we move our asses somewhere else? After all, only LC$ matters

Do you know why they don't come to things where people just complain at them?

Because whether or nor they reply there, scumbags like you will still complain to them in other places where they have literally no sway. "Riot" isn't one entity, just as Google isn't one guy- the head search algorithm designer has no say on what the UI guys do, who don't influence the Customer Service guys.

You're complaining to a WRITER about BALANCE things- in **no** world are those two things interchangable.

I'm sorry, seeing this in Discussion View, it appears you quoted me, is this aimed at me? Because I haven't made any real complaints about Illaoi and balance, since I haven't seen or played her yet.

I was just commenting on a lack of interaction between two characters who I thought would have an interaction.
Uh, read the chain. No.
Sorry, meant Chronological view, not Discussion view. Quotes and replies don't work the same way. Switched it to Discussion View and I see what you mean now.
Champions designers aren't part of balance team, so... . Anyway what's the point to answering all the rage and qq threads. Can't you wait patiently for hot fix, that is coming this week?

thats because screaming "YASUO IS OP" at them over and over again doesn't help... they know he is OP and are trying to figure out the best way to handle it without effecting other aspects of the game, maybe if you guys gave some helpful insight other than "REMOVE OP ASS DOUBLE CRIT YASUO CANCER HATE RITO". Besides they are part of the champion design team i believe, specifically writing part? not the balance team so they can't help with the QQ threads. They are responding to a thread that has to do with their work specifically what they themselves have worked on.
Because everyone on Riot works on the balance team, according to the majority of the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-11-15T20:59:33.506+0000)
>
> As a "bug" question 
> 
> Have you tried taunting it several times?
> 
> Illaoi has pushed forward the tech work we started on Dunk master Darius, sion, rek'sai, Tahm  kench and kindred
> 
> She has a banks of general taunts, faction taunts, and specific taunts.  
> 
> So, when you taunt with her you should keep getting new various taunts -depending on a couple variables.

Speaking of tech... Ao Shin? Any progress done? Even the slightest amount? Are you guys even getting close to developing the tech needed to finally create him?

I just looked up the Quotes at LoLWiki, not sure if all of them are there (actually I am confident the opposite is true), but anyways, I couldn't find a taunt regarding Kha'Zix. From what I've seen so far, Illaoi is all about Motion and change while Kha'Zix even says himself: "Change is good"
Did I miss something or is it not likely to happen, since they probably mean other "changes"?
It isnt safe to post that question here.....They are coming

> [{quoted}](name=GenociderX,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-11-15T14:29:50.455+0000)
>
> It isnt safe to post that question here.....They are coming

Of course it is. Illaoi could simply boast she has more tentacles than Vel'Koz.

You all have dirty minds.

> [{quoted}](name=BLU Medic,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-11-15T14:42:35.219+0000)

> [{quoted}](name=Dreamspitter,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-11-15T15:10:36.119+0000)
>
> What are you talking about?

I have no idea!
Relevant username is relevant.

"I have more tentacles than you **_and I know what to do with them_**"

This needs to be an Illaoi taunt to Velkoz so bad.
That's actually pretty good one.
Some one was a bit _cautious_ as you can see
draw us a picture and i will tell you how i feel about the interaction.

> [{quoted}](name=Cansema,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-15T19:52:03.529+0000)
>
> draw us a picture and i will tell you how i feel about the interaction.

http://puu.sh/lmKJE/283669bcf6.png

> [{quoted}](name=BLU Medic,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-11-15T20:13:21.563+0000)
>
> http://puu.sh/lmKJE/283669bcf6.png

yup.. i imagine it would be something like that
They really should have "Ahri is mine!" "No, she's mine!" after a couple seconds of standing next to eachother.

> [{quoted}](name=SophiaHearts,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2015-11-16T10:11:57.584+0000)
>
> They really should have "Ahri is mine!" "No, she's mine!" after a couple seconds of standing next to eachother.

"Yah darn lil squid, I'm gonna teach this gurl a lesson! Stand aside!"
"Excuse me, larger female specimen, but I targeted this individual first."

Shouldn't be for just Ahri, should be for all female champions.

why would there be any interaction. . .vel'koz is supose to be a monster from the void, he has nothing to do with illoai's sea god. on that same logic there should be interactions between soraka and kindred cause they are both more or less lamb ppl. anyone with a gun should interact with anyone else with a gun. WW and kindred should also have interactions cause of the wolf aspects. lucian and karma should interact for both being black. just cause there are similarities doesnt mean they should interact.

I think I mentioned this before, but there's a second theme here. Illaoi goes around offering lessons, and Vel'Koz is a character who wants to learn things. There's at least a far bigger connection between Illaoi and Vel'Koz than there is between Illaoi and Rek'Sai or Illaoi and Garen.

> [{quoted}](name=NostolgicSkies,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-11-16T17:01:44.648+0000)
>
> why would there be any interaction. . .vel'koz is supose to be a monster from the void, he has nothing to do with illoai's sea god. on that same logic there should be interactions between soraka and kindred cause they are both more or less lamb ppl. anyone with a gun should interact with anyone else with a gun. WW and kindred should also have interactions cause of the wolf aspects. lucian and karma should interact for both being black. just cause there are similarities doesnt mean they should interact.

Because people watch too much japanese disgusting tentacle porn shit crap.

I'd have thought she'd share the quotes she has for Rek'Sai with the other Voidborn. Seems weird to only single her out, especially considering Illaoi has group taunts for the Ascendants, Demacians, Yordles, and Shadow Isles champs.

> [{quoted}](name=MTMTERID,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-15T21:48:38.628+0000)
>
> I'd have thought she'd share the quotes she has for Rek'Sai with the other Voidborn. Seems weird to only single her out, especially considering Illaoi has group taunts for the Ascendants, Demacians, Yordles, and Shadow Isles champs.

Thing is Illaoi has specific lines for people like Tahm Kench, Garen and Katarina. She has nothing to do with the latter two, so can't Vel'Koz have one specific line for him since they have a somewhat similar eldritch horror theme?

> [{quoted}](name=Zuom,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=yUWvyO6i,comment-id=000400010000,timestamp=2015-11-15T21:31:28.794+0000)
>
> Champions designers aren't part of balance team, so... . Anyway what's the point to answering all the rage and qq threads. Can't you wait patiently for hot fix, that is coming this week?

I don't know what you're on about? I was just referring to taunts and voice lines, not actual balance.
You really need to use discussion mode. You are confusing yourself by using chronological mode. Zuom was not in any way talking to you.

I prefer chronological mode because then the top comments aren't forced to the top, meaning that more people's opinions get seen, rather than the first person to make a joke being upvoted and the first page of posts being people replying to that rather than the thread itself.
What about {{champion:1}}
+1 for summoner name.
They probably were planning one, but it got removed for being NSFW.
So wait, you think they should interact just because they have tentacles?  Isn't that a bit racist?

No, they have tentacles in common, but they're both also about motion and learning. Illaoi goes on about teaching people lessons, and Vel'Koz is someone who likes learning. They also share the strange, scary eldritch horror theme.
My bad, I meant speciest.  Implying that things with tentacles must like other things with tentacles.
Give it time, she's still on the PBE. They can still add some taunts in before she's officially out.
There is. You just can't have that in a "T" rated game *Kappa*
